name: Marc Celes S. Jadia
courses: Theoretical Driving & Practical Driving Course – Motorcycles and Light Vehicles
bio: Marc brings technical expertise and precision to his teaching. His methodical approach ensures students master both theoretical knowledge and practical skills for safe, confident driving.

name: Jo Francisco B. Ramos
courses: Theoretical & Practical Driving Course – Light Vehicles
bio: Jo Francisco is dedicated to helping students become confident, skilled drivers. With his patient approach and clear instructions, he ensures everyone masters the fundamentals of safe driving.

name: Ian Mata Obrero
bio: Ian is known for his cool head and fun quizzes. He can parallel park with his eyes closed (but he won't, don't worry!).

name: Harry Intrepido Morl
bio: Harry brings the energy! He loves a good driving pun and believes every lesson should end with a high five.

name: Ferdinand "Toto" Jil Sulat Jadia
bio: Known to everyone as 'Toto', he runs a tight ship in his driving lessons. His strict adherence to safety protocols might seem demanding at first, but his students quickly appreciate how much they learn. As Toto says, 'You'll thank me when you avoid your first accident because of what I taught you.'

name: Martin Amar Gellecañao
bio: Martin's superpower? He can actually take a nap while his students drive! (Don't worry, he doesn't really do this!) But his students become so skilled that he says he could trust them to drive him home with his eyes closed.

name: Rolly Delos Santos Sastrado
bio: Need a driving lesson at 5AM? Rolly's your guy! With his infectious laugh and 'no silly question' policy, he makes even the most nervous students feel right at home. His students say driving with Rolly is like taking a road trip with your funniest friend!
